name: 2Jigsaw
description:
2Jigsaw is still in early development, many features are in, but many are still to be added.

The game is stable, with bugs included, at least on my test laptop (Linux Mint).

note about artwork used for puzzles: all the artwork used within this game is sourced online. The last thing i want is to take someones art who hasn't licensed it under a license that permits this kind of reuse.

If you see any art in this game that you think shouldn't be there, get it touch and ill remove it asap.
